title: Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery                    Civilians    6 Photos  This gallery contains photos of Libby Custer and other non-military civilians that were associated with those involved in the Battle of Little Bighorn.          Markers and Memorials    8 Photos  Historic photographs of the Little Bighorn Battlefield memorials and Custer National Cemetery markers.           Military    17 Photos  Photographs of the 7th Cavalry, Civil War, additional battles, campaigns, expeditions, forts, and Indian scouts.            Events and Anniversaries    26 Photos  This gallery contains photos of events and anniversaries of the Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument.           American Indian    9 Photos  Photographs of American Indian scouts, village life, individuals, and groups associated with the Battle of Little Bighorn or historical figures.          George Armstrong Custer    4 Photos  Photographs and artifacts associated with George Armstrong Custer.            Horses   3 Photos  Photographs of horses associated with the Battle of the Little Bighorn or historical figures.          National Park Service Centennial   3 Photos  High-resolution photos to celebrate the NPS Centennial.          Wildlife    3 Photos  Wildlife found in Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument.             Call of the Bugle    1 Photos
